reviewText: I got hooked on Karl when watching him travel from country to country on 'Idiot Abroad.' Now, I have watched the first few episodes of "The Moaning of Life" on this BluRay and love it. Super funny. The only downside is that it is a format that some USA DVD players will not play. My Sony would not play it, but my LG DVD player will play it.
If you liked "Idiot Abroad"- then you'll like this!  Very, very funny. No problems playing on my USA Samsung Blu-ray player.
It came in plastic wrap nice and safe. I LOVE this show!!
Well, blue ray will not play on American players!! Not happy!!
I'm still laughing!
I love Karl. If you are in the need of some great laughs. He's your guy. Make sure to pick up his other DVDs.

The series is quite incredible and I'm saddened that there aren't more (of this and An Idiot Abroad). The Moaning of Life is a lot like An Idiot Abroad, but provides a more intimate look into Karl's mind - which is hilarious. The only complaint I have is that there aren't more of them!

Heads up: the discs will not play in my PS3, but play just fine in my Xbox One.

If you are a fan of Karl, this is a fun series.  However, it would not play in my Sony Blue Ray.  I have an LG and a Samsung Blue Ray Player, and no problems with either of those.  So, if you only have a Sony, you may want to hesitate before purchasing this.
I'm a little biased because I love Karl's philosophy rants. It's funny and  I enjoyed the different ways it looked at the different stages of life.
Will not play on blu-ray players in the US. Mine is Sony and very new and I couldn't get the disc to play beyond the menu.
funniest guy
We cannot get enought of Karl Pilkington the guy has such a unique point of view on life.  The disc played fine on our PS4.
Its hard to live up to "An Idiot Abroad ", but Carl is always worth watching.

If you liked An Idiot Abroad you'll love this series. Karl is much funnier when he's not being a stooge to Ricky Gervais and just being himself. As he travels the world looking for what makes people happy, or want children, or how they pick a career, his look at the world is both insightful and his comments hysterical.
The show is hilarious. Love Karl. But this dvd is for UK only. Didn't realize. No one be as stupid as me. Thankfully I can play it on my Mac. But great show.
it's karl... you either love him or you don't.
Doesn't play on Onkyo player.
amazing. buy it.
This doesn't even play in my blue ray player
Hilarious!
This Blu-ray played fine on my Samsung Blu-ray player.
Very good but rather short with just 5 episodes. I think Idiot Abroad was helped by Ricky and Steve needling him.
